caption: Several individuals arrive at a meadow where a person has been killed. They decide to ambush from a specific location, waiting until 9 PM. Beside a swimming pool, someone sneaks in. The ambusher confronts him, and they engage in a fierce fight. The intruder gets pushed into the pool, and they wrestle underwater. Eventually, the intruder is subdued. The ambusher then checks the belongings of the intruder and discovers a USB drive, reacting with shock. At this moment, he is ambushed by the intruder. The scene flashes back to an earlier time where a bank is being robbed, and all its occupants are seated on the ground with their hands on their heads.
